title: For Apple, A Limited Victory Against Samsung In Infringement Case
teaser: In a case between tech giants Apple and Samsung, a jury has issued a mixed verdict. The decision marks only the latest in an ongoing struggle over patents between the two companies.
contentencoded:
In a case between tech giants Apple and Samsung, a jury has issued a mixed verdict. The decision marks only the latest in an ongoing struggle over patents between the two companies, a struggle that is expected to see its next skirmish at the Supreme Court later this year.

Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
